name: 劉建宏
objective: 1.單元測試 2.互動測試 3.整合測試 4.分析與設計模型測試 5.功能測試 6.圖形介面測試 7.系統測試
schedule:
(Week 1)       Introduction to Software Testing and Verification
(Week 2)       Fundamentals of Software Testing
(Week 3)       Software Testing Process
(Week 4)       Software Test Documentation
(Week 5)       Black Box Testing Methods
(Week 6)       White Box Testing Methods 
(Week 7)       Test Adequacy Criteria
(Week 8)       Static Analysis
(Week 9)       Midterm Exam
(Week 10)      Unit Testing
(Week 11)      Integration Testing
(Week 12)      System Testing
(Week 13)      GUI Testing
(Week 14)      Object-Oriented Software Testing
(Week 15)      Performance Testing
(Week 16)      Advanced Topics
(Week 17)      Paper Presentation
(Week 18)      Final Exam
materials:
Reference Books:
Software Testing and Analysis: Process, Principle, and Techniques, Wiley, 2007.
